title: T2W4 - Being Honest
subtitle: T2W4
meanings_cn: 傍晚时分，公园沐浴在温暖的阳光下，落入地平线之下。
亨利和我抄近路穿过附近的公园回家。
亨利抱怨我们布置的作业量太大。
我看到地上有黑色和棕色的东西引起了我的注意。
我蹲下来仔细一看，是一个昂贵的名牌钱包。
我考虑着是否应该打开检查里面的内容。
当我们打开钱包时，我们看到了一叠五十元的钞票。
sentences: The evening sunbathed the park in a warm glow of light as it descended beneath the horizon.
Henry and I were taking a short cut through the nearby park to get home.
While Henry complained about the amount of homework we had been given.
I saw something black and brown on the ground that caught my attention.
I crouched down to take a closer look, it was an expensive designer wallet.
I deliberated if I should open to check its contents.
When we opened the wallet, we saw a wad of fifty-dollar notes.
